name: Mario: Die unheimliche Mine
overview: Mario - Die unheimliche Mine is a Text Adventure game with Graphics, published by 64'er, which was released in 1985. Specifically this was released in both 64'er Sonderheft 1985/02 and in 64'er Sonderheft 52. This game was later translated (unofficially) into English, though still with the German title. The story is a persiflage of the first two Lord of the Rings books.
